data.title: Free Pub Quiz with Answers | 500 Pub Quiz General Knowledge Questions
meta_keywords: Browse our 500 free pub quiz questions and answers. Perfect for any pub trivia night
our questions cover a wide range of topics from general knowledge to specific themes.
data.meta_description: Browse our 500 free pub quiz questions and answers. Perfect for any pub trivia night, our questions cover a wide range of topics from general knowledge to specific themes.
data.text:
Pub quizzes have become a staple of entertainment, bringing together friends, families, and trivia enthusiasts. Whether you're a quizmaster seeking to host the next big pub trivia night, or simply a trivia aficionado looking for a challenge, we've got you covered with our comprehensive list of 500 free pub quiz questions and answers.

Covering a broad range of topics from history and geography to music and movies, our extensive list promises to engage every participant, regardless of their area of expertise. All of these quiz questions and answers, including thousands more, are included on our Random Quiz Question Generator, available in keyring or wall sticker format. Prepare to test your knowledge and challenge your memory with these thought-provoking questions, enjoy!

What is the study of mushrooms called?

Mycology

Which movie, starring Brad Pitt and Edward Norton, is based on a novel by Chuck Palahniuk?

Fight Club

What is the capital of Malaysia?

Kuala Lumpur

What is the name of the peninsula located in the northern part of Norway, Finland, and Russia?

Kola Peninsula

In which year did the First World War end?

1918

George Frideric Handel
